title: Ambedkar University Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Research Assistant Posts
description: Ambedkar University University Delhi has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the Ambedkar University Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date.
